definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Do you agree that only elected District Council members should take part in the election?
sentences.chinese: 是否贊成只由民選區議員參與互選？

sentences.english: This week, he was resoundingly upheld by the Ninth Circuit.
sentences.chinese: 這星期，他的意見轟動性的被第九巡迴法院贊成了。

sentences.english: entered into an advertising dalliance with Google, but this fell apart after antitrust authorities signalled that they would not approve such an agreement.
sentences.chinese: 但是因反托馬斯當局的不贊成，他們的聯盟落空。

sentences.english: Are you for or against this proposal?
sentences.chinese: 你是贊成還是反對這項建議？

sentences.english: Which indeed is approved by Marxism- Leninism?
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義到底贊成哪一個呢？

sentences.english: His parents approved of the match.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母贊成了這門親事。

sentences.english: There should be no sub-contracting unless previously agreed with the main client.
sentences.chinese: 不該該有任何分包，除非以前與首要客戶贊成。

sentences.english: Do you agree that most of the new seats in the 4th sector should be allocated to District Council members?
sentences.chinese: 是否贊成第四界別的新增議席，大部分分配給區議員？

sentences.english: Mr. Hendrickson isn't in favor of mixing beards and business suits either.
sentences.chinese: 亨德里克森也不贊成留着鬍子而穿西裝。

sentences.english: If as citizens we vote for war, then war it will be.
sentences.chinese: 如果公民們都贊成戰爭，那就會爆發戰爭。

sentences.english: South Africa's constitution is remarkably pro-gay.
sentences.chinese: 南非憲法是非常贊成同性戀的。

sentences.english: While Rowhani indicated he favors improving ties with the international community.
sentences.chinese: 雖然魯哈尼表示他贊成改善與國際社會的關係。

sentences.english: Someone suggested to restrict the Net a few days ago and I agreed with it.
sentences.chinese: 前些時候有人建議對網絡加以限制，我很贊成。

sentences.english: The experts agree with the old saying " You that you should never put anything smaller than your elbow in your ear."
sentences.chinese: 專家贊成俗語絕不要把比肘部小的東西放進耳朵裏。

sentences.english: I absolutely agree with you on that…
sentences.chinese: 在這點上，我舉雙手贊成。

sentences.english: I don't approve of your defeatist attitude.
sentences.chinese: 我不贊成你這種失敗主義的態度。

definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
